授業目的: This course aims at deliberating the basics of business and economic data analysis. In this course, the students will learn various quantitative analysis tools such as mean, mode, median, variance, standard deviation, sampling, correlations, and regressions of economic data. Simultaneously, the students will be acquainted with financial data analysis techniques such as ratio analysis, vertical and horizontal analysis, and calculation of sustainable growth.
到達目標: After completing the course, students will learn the application of statistical and financial tools and techniques for analyzing economic and financial data. The course is useful for any business student interested in learning quantitative data analysis tools and techniques.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be offered in a face-to-face format. Course pedagogy includes lectures, homework, and exams to illustrate and reinforce basic concepts. Students are expected to buy the textbook and read assigned materials prior to attending every session. The instructor will supply the reading materials in advance. Please note that if the COVID-19 crisis continues, I will offer this class online using zoom during the crisis period. I will send you the lecture power points and reading materials soon before the first class. Please send me your email address to adhikarykobejp@gmail.com to get the necessary instructions on course-related information and reading materials. Also, I am leaving here my cell phone number 08039854615 so that you can contact me on Viber and reach me at any time for class consultation. Please use Viber and Gmail to communicate with me.

第1回: Face to face: Introduction and overview of the course: Understanding financial and economic data- time series, cross-section, and panel data

Please send me your email address immediately to adhikarykobejp@gmail.com
I would send you class materials. For emergency, contact me on 08039854615
第2回: Face to face: Technology, frequency distributions, and charts
第3回: Face to face: Measures of Central Tendency: mean, mode, median, variance, and standard deviation
第4回: Face to face: Measures of Central Tendency: Z score, percentiles, quartiles, correlation, and covariance
第5回: Face to face: Sampling and confidence intervals
第6回: Face to face: Analysis of variance
第7回: Face to face: Correlations and basic regressions
第8回: Face to face: Discussion of Assignments
第10回: Face to face: Financial data analysis: Horizontal, vertical, and ratios analyses
第11回: Face to face: DuPont Model and growth analysis
第12回: Face to face: Determining the sustainable growth of a firm
第13回: Face to face: Understanding EVA and bankruptcy of a firm
第14回: Face to face: Discussion of assignments/final report

教科書/Required texts1: Barry Render, Ralph M. Stair, Michael E. Hanna, and Trevor S. Hale
Quantitative Analysis for Management Global 13 ed.
参考書/Reference books2: Statistical Techniques in Business and Economics, 17e
